KSLO_RICH_TEXT_T.FORMATTED: Learning objectives defined by faculty that are specific to a course
KSLO_RICH_TEXT_T.PLAIN: Learning objectives defined by faculty that are specific to a course

KSLO_RICH_TEXT_T.FORMATTED: Learning objectives mandated by the Institution. They represent learning objectives of the institutions general education and are inherited by all programs
KSLO_RICH_TEXT_T.PLAIN: Learning objectives mandated by the Institution. They represent learning objectives of the institutions general education and are inherited by all programs
